Okay, so I downloaded it, opened it, and there was like 100 files, 50 movie files, and 50 non movie files. What the hell? Obviously something's wrong with my computer because nobody else seems to hve the same problem...Can somebody help me out?

Thanks mate.  The audio was low but I was able to boost it in Win 7 by opening 'speakers properties', 'enhancements', 'loudness equalisation'.

theblade180:  Just click on the first VLC file (VIDEO_TS, 178kb) and it starts the movie at the main menu.  Play or select a different language from there.
